content.title: Do I need to have breakfast before training is a question that worries girls who start their day by going to the gym. Are there any benefits to exercising on an empty stomach? Let's figure it out.

content.text: There is a theory that exercising on an empty stomach allows you to burn more fat and lose weight more effectively . Is it so?

It is known that before the first breakfast a person has low blood glucose and insulin levels. If you start exercising on an empty stomach, you will quickly deplete all available glucose reserves. This will contribute to the rapid breakdown of fats.
However, after the body has exhausted all available glycogen stores, it will need more energy for productive work.
Many scientists confirm the fact of fast weight loss thanks to hungry workouts. But is there any benefit from this for the body?

content.title: Benefits of training on an empty stomach

content.text: Exercising on an empty stomach can be beneficial, but not for everyone. Let's highlight the advantages:

content.perechen: in a short period of time you can lose weight;
training on an empty stomach will help to cheer up and speed up the metabolic processes of the body;
motivate for a reasonable diet without unnecessary sweets for breakfast or lunch;
morning classes are more difficult to postpone or reschedule;
if you do cardio in the morning a habit, you will automatically be able to adjust your schedule of the day, and, consequently, your sleep pattern.

content.text: You can train on an empty stomach only in the morning. In the evening or in the afternoon, such activities should not be practiced, since you will only bring harm to the body.

content.title: What is the right way to train on an empty stomach?

content.perechen: It is recommended that you consult a doctor before you start practicing workouts on an empty stomach. As a rule, exercise is contraindicated for people with heart or blood pressure problems.
Choose which direction of cardio is right for you. This can be aerobics in the fresh air, running or one of the dance styles.

Develop the habit gradually, thus checking how the body responds to stress on an empty stomach. The first sessions can generally last about 15 minutes. Walk down the street at a fast pace, walk up / down the floors.
Get a good sleep before each workout.
Water. As with any workout routine, it is very important to drink plenty of water.
Don't overdo it. Better for longer, but at a moderate pace. Trust me, an hour of cardio at a calm pace will do much more good than a half hour workout in hard work mode.
Train only with your own weight, you do not need to use additional dumbbells or any weights.

content.text: Important: The main goal of your workout is to feel well, and if doing an exercise on an empty stomach makes you feel less joyful, this is a clear sign that you need to change your approach.
